1.7.10.7.5.0: Fixed a bunch of back-end and mixin stuff, a new-tag based update checker

1.8.9.8.7.0: Re-port of 1.7.10 to 1.8.9, a fully up-to-date 1.8.9 version

1.12.2.12.3.106: Fixed FTBU Ranks/Config compatibility, data and scripting fixes
1.12.2.12.3.108: Added Javascript support to the Signtools module, Fixed a few crashes
1.12.2.12.3.116: The timeout bug that occurs when trying to resolve a player has been fixed.
1.12.2.12.3.117: Fix bug with Sponge Compat feature
1.12.2.12.3.122: Fix a few edge cases with permissions, Backup Module not saving daily backups, and other msc fixes
1.12.2.12.3.123: Couple Fixes and a Forge Gradle Upgrade (14.23.5.2855)
1.12.2.12.3.124: Fix a bug with timed command and minor build changes
1.12.2.12.4.125: Adds basic discord bridge functionality to the chat module to complement the irc functionality
1.12.2.12.4.126: Fixed Sponge Compat when economy module is disabled, a new-tag based update checker
1.12.2.12.5.0: Votifier V2 support, Chat logging expansions, Fixed multiple data and class loading issues.

1.16.5.16.0.1: Fixed a bunch of command and general cleanup
1.16.5.16.0.2: Fix broken module.cfg file generation, and incompatibility with KotlinForForge
1.16.5.16.0.3: Seperated Chat Module, Multiworld and JScripting Ported
1.16.5.16.0.4: ScoreBoardColors, Votifier V2 support, Added Support for this update checker
